rules_text: [i]Heroic[/i] – Whenever you cast a spell that targets this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on it. It gains your choice of double strike, deathtouch, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, trample, or vigilance until end of turn.
